channel.title: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/
channel.description:
hi this is a armor i made from a monster i got it out of RSMV plz no flaming this is my first armor i made i cant show ingame yet because its not working so far but it did take me 2days to make it i'll tell you why after i got the ingame pic in ok so heres the armor
front [img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/6756/darkassassingear.jpg[/img]
and the side [img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/7770/darkassassingearside.jpg[/img]
plz rate if you wont to and the ingame pic si coming soon!! ^^ :D

item.title: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

14-08:

Also, don’t bitch about his grammar, when we are using the internet. Look at basically any site, 90% of the people their use abbreviations. that doesn’t particularly mean that they can’t spell.

It’s in the MoparScape Terms Of Service NOT to use abbreviations…

Read full topic
item.source: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/

item.title: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

Why do people, such as Zyle1992, have to come on this forum and bitch at someone for offering decent criticism. And don’t rant on about how bad people’s models are when you have not made any that we know about. Also, don’t bitch about his grammar, when we are using the internet. Look at basically any site, 90% of the people their use abbreviations. that doesn’t particularly mean that they can’t spell.

Read full topic
item.source: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/

item.title: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/
item.dc:creator: @Level_99_Noob_Slayin Level 99 Noob Slaying
item.description:
@Level_99_Noob_Slayin wrote:

CoonHunter… Wow… Why do you have to discourage his work? When I first saw it I didn’t know it was TzKet-Jad until I read the posts. You’re models aren’t too great either. Lastly, learn to spell…

Read full topic
item.source: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/

item.title: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. “from” not “front”, “an” not “a”, “different” not “diferent”, “you” not “u”, I could go on for a while…
  2. Look back a few months. Energy sword, Plasma rifle, Rocket Launcher. That’s 3 models that are higher quality than yours.
  3. YOU said it yourself you used 30 primitive cylinders. Which is excessive by any means. [quote=“CoonHunter, post:21, topic:288469”]The handle was primitive based, just with about 30 of them. Just rotated a bunch.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/

item.title: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Lol Zyle u haven’t even modeled. Also, I did the handle and ALL front scratch. If u think diferent then post proof. Also I don’t keep a dictionary on hand to remember spelling. Finally my computer is busted. Whitch has a auto spell checker for anything. Just to finish, don’t judge models when you have done NONE youself. Or at least not posted any.

Read full topic
item.source: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/

item.title: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. What’s a ‘fn’ handle?
  2. It’s medieval not “mideivel”. And why would you spell it differently when you refer to it?
  3. Learn to use quote tags
  4. Are you referring to the blade that looks like you took the blade from the rs cache, used 30 primitive cylinders for the handle, and a malformed circle at the base? I wouldn’t want to admit it was one of your “better” models.

Read full topic
item.source: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/

item.title: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:14, topic:293580”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=388449.msg2904157#msg2904157 date=1249699049]

Looks Like you took Tz-Tok-Jad, straightened his legs, made his torso vertical rather than horizontal, and removed the arms and head.

I’m surprised no one else did this Nice job

@Zyle - lets not promote these things. Its not good to recolor and edit a model. Its small and easy work.

@Fangfl - Please do not listen to Zyle and think continueing on this is good, because it will only get you flamed. Try making something from scratch with the trace method, it may not be the best model ul see or look as good as jagex models, but that is something to be proud of and want to say “I created that peice of work!”.
[/quote]

It’s an effort. Something you’ve never given.[/quote]
That shows how often you look here. I made a fn handle from 112 faces, and not triangles. Look for my mideivel blade. I dont remember how i spelled it though. Thats one of my better models. Also, dont make a judgement before you look.
[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/

item.title: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:11, topic:293580”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=388449.msg2903965#msg2903965 date=1249691737]
Looks Like you took Tz-Tok-Jad, straightened his legs, made his torso vertical rather than horizontal, and removed the arms and head.

I’m surprised no one else did this Nice job
[/quote]
@Zyle - lets not promote these things. Its not good to recolor and edit a model. Its small and easy work.

@Fangfl - Please do not listen to Zyle and think continueing on this is good, because it will only get you flamed. Try making something from scratch with the trace method, it may not be the best model ul see or look as good as jagex models, but that is something to be proud of and want to say “I created that peice of work!”.[/quote]

It’s an effort. Something you’ve never given.

Read full topic

item.title: \show/ armor i made from a monster \show/
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:12, topic:293580”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=388449.msg2904157#msg2904157 date=1249699049]

Looks Like you took Tz-Tok-Jad, straightened his legs, made his torso vertical rather than horizontal, and removed the arms and head.

I’m surprised no one else did this Nice job

@Zyle - lets not promote these things. Its not good to recolor and edit a model. Its small and easy work.

@Fangfl - Please do not listen to Zyle and think continueing on this is good, because it will only get you flamed. Try making something from scratch with the trace method, it may not be the best model ul see or look as good as jagex models, but that is something to be proud of and want to say “I created that peice of work!”.
[/quote]

actually he messed with it enough that you wouldnt be able to tell what he did unless he told you (without examining it thoroughly)
and here he did tell us what he did, but yes doing things from scratch is the right way to go.

But tbh, i like it.[/quote]
How could i not tell? It has Jad feet for fn sake. Its little things like that, that give-away that detail.

Read full topic

But tbh, i like it.
